#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
int bubbleSort(int arr[], int n) {
bool swapped = true;
int j = 0;
int count=0;
int tmp;
while (swapped) {
swapped = false;
j++;
for (int i = 0; i < n - j; i++) {
if (arr[i] > arr[i + 1]) {
tmp = arr[i];
arr[i] = arr[i + 1];
arr[i + 1] = tmp;
count++;
swapped = true;
}
}
}
return count;
}
int main ()
{
int T,N,t,arr[100002],steps,temp;
scanf("%d", &T);
vector<int>box1,box2;
vector<int>::iterator pos;
while(T--)
{
box1.clear();box2.clear();
scanf("%d", &N);
for(int i=0; i<N;i++)
{
scanf("%d", &t);
box1.push_back(t);
}
for(int i=0; i<N;i++)
{
scanf("%d", &t);
box2.push_back(t);
}
 
for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
{
pos=find(box1.begin(),box1.end(),box2[i]);
temp=distance(box1.begin(),pos);
arr[temp]=i+1;
}
 
steps=bubbleSort(arr,N);
printf("%d\n",steps);
}
}
